Author: shortLavender
Text: The same thing happened to me! I decided that I was 'safe' and stayed consistant and remained at ~3lb increase, which I was okay with. Somewhere over the last month or so (hid the scale for a while) I put on 2 more lbs. Not the end of the world though since recovery is more important. I have been working on recovery for 9 months now. There is hope, I have learned my bodies signs and signals in a much healthier way and know how to appropriately approach them. Don't give up!
